description.x-y:
Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user
protects itself and its allies from damaging moves.
This does not stop status moves.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user
protects itself and its allies from damaging moves.
This does not stop status moves.

description.sword-shield:

itself and its allies from damaging moves. This does
not stop status moves.

effect.full: Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves.  Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out.
effect.shortEffect: Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves.  Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out.
